content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) and a Stone Furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)

### Electricity Generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5), a Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0), and an Offshore Pump at position (106.5, -32.5)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a Stone Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when placing entities without checking inventory
  - Ensure the entity is in the inventory before attempting to place it
* Errors when placing entities at occupied positions
  - Remove the existing entity before placing a new one at the same position
* Errors when using connect_entities function
  - Ensure the positions of the entities are valid and can be connected
* Errors when crafting entities
  - Ensure all required sub-ingredients are available before crafting
* Errors when using place_entity function
  - Ensure the position is valid and the entity can be placed at that position
* Errors when using place_entity_next_to function
  - Ensure the entity to place next to exists and has a valid position

### NAMESPACE
* Defined functions:
	+ place_entity
	+ place_entity_next_to
	+ connect_entities
* Important variables:
	+ coal_patch (position)
	+ drill (Burner Mining Drill entity)
	+ furnace (Stone Furnace entity)
	+ Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill
	+ Prototype.StoneFurnace
	+ Prototype.TransportBelt
* Failure modes:
	+ place_entity: failed to place entity due to lack of inventory or occupied position
	+ place_entity_next_to: failed to place entity due to non-existent entity to place next to
	+ connect_entities: failed to connect entities due to invalid positions
* Success modes:
	+ place_entity: successfully placed entity at the specified position
	+ place_entity_next_to: successfully placed entity next to the specified entity
	+ connect_entities: successfully connected entities
